info.description:
[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/github-api-v3.svg?longCache=True)](https://pypi.org/project/github-api-v3/) #### Installation ```bash $ [sudo] pip install github-api-v3 ``` #### Config shell|python -|- `export GITHUB_TOKEN=""`|`os.environ["GITHUB_TOKEN"]=""` #### Functions function|`__doc__` -|- `github_api_v3.get(url, headers=None)` |make GET request and return a dictionary result `github_api_v3.getall(url, headers=None)` |make GET requests for all pages and return a list of concatenated results `github_api_v3.request(method, url, data=None, **kwargs)` |make request and return a response object `github_api_v3.timestamp.istimestamp(value)` |return True if string is ISO 8601 timestamp, else False `github_api_v3.timestamp.parse(string)` |parse datetime string and return a datetime object #### Examples get starred repos ```python import github_api_v3 url = "https://api.github.com/user/starred" headers = {"Accept": "application/vnd.github.v3.star+json, application/vnd.github.mercy-preview+json"} github_api_v3.getall(url, headers=headers) ```

python-readme-generator
info.name: github-api-v3
info.html_description:
Installation

$ [sudo] pip install github-api-v3

Config

shell python
export GITHUB_TOKEN="<GITHUB_TOKEN>" os.environ["GITHUB_TOKEN"]="<GITHUB_TOKEN>"

Functions

function __doc__
github_api_v3.get(url, headers=None) make GET request and return a dictionary result
github_api_v3.getall(url, headers=None) make GET requests for all pages and return a list of concatenated results
github_api_v3.request(method, url, data=None, **kwargs) make request and return a response object
github_api_v3.timestamp.istimestamp(value) return True if string is ISO 8601 timestamp, else False
github_api_v3.timestamp.parse(string) parse datetime string and return a datetime object

Examples

get starred repos

import github_api_v3

url = "https://api.github.com/user/starred"
headers = {"Accept": "application/vnd.github.v3.star+json, application/vnd.github.mercy-preview+json"}
github_api_v3.getall(url, headers=headers)

python-readme-generator
